==== Notes ====
* When moving windows via title bar the cursor turns to a wierd box (Hoary)
* To install Breezy (Preview) acpi must be turned off.  Otherwise install hangs.
* Sony PCMCIA CD drive works during install, but does not work after install (Breezy)
* /dev/hda1 contains DOS partition with Pheonix NoteBIOS hibernation utilities
